questions.question: ここ（＿）　しゃしんを　とっても　いいですか？
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～で - place where an action occurs

しゃしんをとる - take a picture

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「ここでしゃしんをとってもいいですか」 means "Can I take a picture here?"

  • に - direction/time
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is で.

  • に - direction/time
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker

questions.question: 私は　昨日　新しい　かさ（＿）　買いました。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～を 買う - to buy something

かさ - umbrella

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「かさを買いました」 means "I bought an umbrella."

  • に - not suitable for direct object
  • が - subject marker
  • で - location of action
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is を.

  • に - not suitable for direct object
  • が - subject marker
  • で - location of action

questions.question: 私は　にく（＿）　たべません。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～を たべる - to eat something

にく - meat

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「にくをたべません」 means "I do not eat meat."

  • が - subject marker
  • は - topic marker
  • に - indirect marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

questions.question: 田中さんは　英語（＿）　上手です。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～が 上手 - good at something (for others)

英語 - English

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「英語が上手です」 means "He is good at English."

Incorrect Answer
